desc: Feel the Burn, with custom fit Burn707 OT Bands. Unlike other adjustable BFR & Occlusion Bands that have adjustable straps, OT Bands are fitted based on your specific arm or leg size to more accurately optimize blood flow. Blood pools in your muscles, triggering a hormonal response that stimulates your muscle growth.

layout.text: Increased Weight Loss, More Muscle, Better Tone, and Lower Blood Sugar

Feel the Burn and get the body you’ve been working for, but faster with custom fit BURN707 OT BANDS. Based on the science behind Japanese KAATSU and Blood Flow Restriction (BFR) training methods, we have developed an improved Training method called Optimization Training that you can use in the gym or at home. OT Bands optimize blood flow to your muscles, which in turn delivers big results like increased weight loss, more muscle, better tone, and lower blood sugar.
